name: Feature
description: New functionality or capability being added to the system. Use for user-facing features, API endpoints, or significant enhancements.

name: Bug
description: Software defect or unexpected behavior that needs to be fixed. Use for errors, crashes, incorrect behavior, or quality issues.

name: Goal
description: Measurable objective with defined success criteria. Use for setting goals, objectives, or targets.

name: Project
description: Project-level container for related work with multiple subtasks and milestones. Use for organizing large initiatives or project planning.

name: User Story
description: User story or feature story describing functionality from a user perspective. Use for user-facing features or product requirements.

name: Objective
description: Objective for organizing and tracking work. Use this task type to categorize and manage objective work items.

name: Requirement
description: Requirement for organizing and tracking work. Use this task type to categorize and manage requirement work items.

name: Account
description: Manage client or customer account details and interactions. Use for account management, customer relations, or account-related work.

name: Request
description: Request for organizing and tracking work. Use this task type to categorize and manage request work items.

name: Resource
description: Resource for organizing and tracking work. Use this task type to categorize and manage resource work items.

name: Content
description: Content for organizing and tracking work. Use this task type to categorize and manage content work items.

name: Warning
description: Warning for organizing and tracking work. Use this task type to categorize and manage warning work items.

name: Project File
description: Project-level container for related work with multiple subtasks and milestones. Use for organizing large initiatives or project planning.

name: Error
description: Error for organizing and tracking work. Use this task type to categorize and manage error work items.

name: Lesson Learned
description: Lesson Learned for organizing and tracking work. Use this task type to categorize and manage lesson learned work items.

name: Test Result
description: Testing activities including unit tests, integration tests, or manual testing. Use for test development, test execution, or quality verification.

name: Pull Request
description: Pull Request for organizing and tracking work. Use this task type to categorize and manage pull request work items.

name: Actions Run
description: Actions Run for organizing and tracking work. Use this task type to categorize and manage actions run work items.

name: Commit
description: Commit for organizing and tracking work. Use this task type to categorize and manage commit work items.

name: Command
description: Command for organizing and tracking work. Use this task type to categorize and manage command work items.

name: Branch
description: Branch for organizing and tracking work. Use this task type to categorize and manage branch work items.

name: trest
description: trest for organizing and tracking work. Use this task type to categorize and manage trest work items.
